entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With .NET 8 preview 5 SDK installed, the help description for "--sc, --self-contained" option is not consistent with EN. #32753

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32773
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.1 to 20.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #32767
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Read workload sets in workload manifest reader #32766
    Area-Workloads
  • Containers: rename "Docker daemon" to "local registry". #32751
    untriaged

Merged

  • Port some of the auth changes from 7.0.4xx #32772
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the manifests from the rollback file in the overlay target rather than the yml #32745
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back legacy JS hot reload function #32738
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update dependabot to run on 4xx #31837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Enable EventSourceSupport in ASP.NET Native AOT apps #32538
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Disable dotnet.js fingerprinting for .NET 8 #31829
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.1 to 20.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #32713
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832
    Area-dotnet new
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
